plot: The war between Ajin terrorist Satō and Ajin Administrative Committee has been escalating with Satō declaring a public assassination attempt on 15 Ajin-related VIPs, an action Satō calls "purging." The final confrontations between Ajin and the Japanese government, as well as between Satō and Kei Nagai, are about to begin.
opening_theme: "Boku wa Boku de atte" (僕は僕であって) by angela x fripside
"The end of escape" by fripSide x angela
